Bin	pT-hard range (GeV)	Factor xSec
1	5 - 7	                16.120757983083955
2	7 - 9            	4.619945185754124
3	9 - 12			2.157321005047814
4	12 - 16			0.7847571765493081
5	16 - 21			0.26603742306076916
6	21 - 28			0.09794399383214836
7	28 - 36			0.02944696421524632
8	36 - 45			0.009923606566111517
9	45 - 57			0.00406272340035302
10	57 - 70			0.0013580690946829765
11	70 - 85			0.0005322016330273851
12	85 - 99			0.00018904945071884083
13	99 - 115		9.233616292184498e-05
14	115 - 132		4.2990927325285354e-05
15	132 - 150		2.092298073547425e-05
16	150 - 169		1.0617621913494646e-05
17	169 - 190		5.751591260888193e-06
18	190 - 212		3.000068049878552e-06
19	212 - 235		1.612731290779941e-06
20	235 - -1		2.088664332331315e-06

Scale factor is reported as xsec/(ntrials per event), 
where ntrials is properly computed by normalizing by all events, 
rather than accepted events. The reported scale factor has no 
correction for different number of events in each pT-hard 
bin -- such a correction should be applied when combining the bins.
